Function int_to_bin(n) result(bin_str)

   temp = temp / 2

end do

end function

Function to convert to uppercase:

function to_upper(str) result(res)

character(len=*), intent(in) :: str

character(len=len(str)) :: res

integer :: i

do i = 1, len(str) if (str(i:i) >= 'a' .and. str(i:i) <= 'z') then

      res(i:i) = achar(ichar(str(i:i)) - 32)

function to_upper(str) result(res)

character(len=len(str)) :: res

      res(i:i) = achar(ichar(str(i:i)) - 32)

      if (s(i:i) == '0') then

         zeros = zeros +1

      end if

      mask = mask +1

      cycle

   end if

   ! Replace 0 with 4 and 1 with 7

   character(len=64) :: new_str

   new_str = s

   do i = 1, len_trim(new_str)

      if (new_str(i:i) == '0') then

      else if (new_str(i:i) == '1') then

         new_str(i:i) = '7'

      end if

   end do

end if

   is_vowel = .true.

end if

else

      if (temp_str(i:i) >= 'a' .and. temp_str(i:i) <= 'z') then
